ADDS_AISEND: Sending AI scripts to the clients
CHECK_INSERTCD: Insert TZAR CD and restart the game
CHECK_INSERTCD2: Insert TZAR CD and press OK when ready
ERR_CTFCANTSPAWN: Could not find any free ground to place the flag.
ERR_DXFAILED: Failed to initialize DirectX. Using software renderer.
ERR_VMODE: Error switching to %dx%d%x16 video mode! Switch and try again.
ERR_GPF: TZAR has encountered a problem running on this machine!
ERR_NONET: This machine has no network installed. The multiplayer functions are disabled.
ERR_INVALIDCFG: Invalid TZAR configuration detected. Running configuration program.
ERR_INITMIDI: The music cannot be turned on because the midi device is being used by another application, or the midi device is not working properly.
ERR_DSINIT: DirectSound cannot be turned on because the sound device is being used by another application, or is not working properly. If your DirectSound version is below 5, you must install DirectX 5 or higher.
ERR_MCIINIT: The MCI sound cannot be turned on because the sound device is being used by another application, or the sound device is not working properly.
ERR_BETACONNECT: Error connecting to the beta server.
ERR_SERVERCANCEL: The game was canceled by the server.
ERR_SERVERKICK: You were kicked off by the server.
ERR_MENUROOM: Not enough space for menu definition.
ERR_NETASYNC2: Network async. Some players will be disconnected.
ERR_CLIENTSYNC: Game cannot be started! Some of the clients were unable to initialize their games!
DEFMSG_MOVEDAVANCE: Move and kill everything in sight
DEFMSG_MOVESNEAK: Move and attack only when injured
DEFMSG_PICKITEMINST: Select this item and use it instantly (learn a spell or use a potion)
DEFMSG_REMOVERALLYPOINT: Right click to remove gathering point
DEFMSG_SETRALLYPOINT: Right click to set gathering point
DEFMSG_SETRALLYPOINTDA: Right click to set gathering point with default action
DEFMSG_SETRALLYPOINTADV: Right click to set gathering point with advanced move
DEFMSG_NODECR: No description available for this map
Q_QUIT: Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Q_RESIGN: Are you sure you want to resign?
Q_DISCONNECT: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
VIEWMSG_NOMPCHEAT: No cheats allowed in the multiplayer game!
VIEWMSG_NEWQUEST: Mission objectives have changed. New quest is added.
VIEWMSG_PLAYER_WANT_ENEMY: %s wants to change diplomatic stance with you to enemy
VIEWMSG_PLAYER_WANT_NEUTRAL: %s wants to change diplomatic stance with you to neutral
VIEWMSG_PLAYER_WANT_ALLY: %s wants to change diplomatic stance with you to ally
ORDERS_ADD_TE_CRUSADE: Allows the preaching of a crusade
ORDERS_ADD_TE_ARCHITECTURE: Peasants build faster, and allows stone wall, gate and towers
ORDERS_ADD_TE_HALBERD: Allows the production of spear units
ORDERS_ADD_TE_CANNONTOWER: Allows the building of cannon towers
ORDERS_ADD_TE_NOBILITY: Units around a hero gain experience
ORDERS_ADD_TE_MERCENARIES: Allows the recruitment of units in taverns
ORDERS_ADD_TE_HEROESQUEST: Allows the recruitment of heroes in taverns
ORDERS_ADD_TE_SIEGETACTICS: Allows the production of heavy catapults
ORDERS_ADD_TE_BODYBUILDING: Increases unit's hit points at every new level
ORDERS_ADD_TE_ESPIONAGE: Allows the production of a spy
ORDERS_ADD_TE_TRADETOUTES: Allows trading with ships and caravans
ORDERS_ADD_TE_USURY: Allows the obtaining of loans in taverns
ORDERS_ADD_TE_BRIBERY: Allows the bribing of enemy units
ORDERS_ADD_TE_RIDINGHORSES: Increases the mounted units' attack and defense power
ORDERS_ADD_TE_JIHAD: Allows the production of Jihad Warriors
ORDERS_ADD_TE_WITCHCRAFTS: Allows the building of a magic workshop
ORDERS_ADD_TE_NECROMANCY: Researches the Raise the Dead spell
ORDERS_ADD_TE_SCIMITAR: Increases sword attack power and allows the production of satraps
ORDERS_ADD_TE_GREATWALL: Makes stone walls, towers and gates stronger
ORDERS_ADD_TE_BUDHISM: Increases the building's resistance and allows the building of the  Shao-Linn monastery
ORDERS_ADD_TE_ARMOREDCHARIOT: Allows the production of armored chariots
ORDERS_ADD_TE_BUSHIDO: Allows the production of horse samurai
ORDERS_ADD_TE_PHILOSOPHY: Allows the production of more experienced monks
ORDERS_ADD_TE_KUNGFU: Increases the attack of all kung-fu units
ORDERS_ADD_TE_MASTERY: Allows priests to teach kung-fu units
ORDERS_ADD_TE_TOURNAMENTS: Allows sharing of experience between kung-fu units
ORDERS_ADD_TE_ROCKETARROW: Allows the building of rocket tower
ORDERS_ADD_TE_TURNTOSTONE: Researches the Turn to Stone spell
ORDERS_ADD_TE_ARTOFRIDING: Allows the production of horse archers
HELP_CN_CAMPAIGNS: Select which campaign you want to play
HELP_CN_ENTRY_MISSONS: Select the map you want to start with
HELP_CN_BACK: Return to the SINGLE PLAYER SCREEN
HELP_CM_MAPS: To choose a MAP, move the cursor over its name and click the mouse button
HELP_CM_BACK: Return to the SINGLE PLAYER SCREEN
HELP_RM_VICTORY_CONDITION: Establish the EXACT CONDITION to win a game
HELP_RM_STARTING_RESOURCES: Select the level of starting RESOURCES
HELP_RM_NO_FOG: Visualizes the area which your units are able to see
HELP_RM_MAP_RESOURCES: Defines the quantity of MAP RESOURCES
HELP_RM_GUARDED_TOWN: Select to have a GUARDED TOWN
HELP_RM_BACK: Return to the SINGLE PLAYER SCREEN
HELP_MP_GAME_NAME: Type a GAME NAME when requested
HELP_MP_GAME_INFORMATION: Displays a description of the selected game
HELP_MPC_DISCONNECT: Return to the MULTIPLAYER SETUP SCREEN
HELP_MPS_VICTORY_CONDITION: Establish the EXACT CONDITION to win a game
HELP_MPS_STARTING_RESOURCES: Select the level of starting RESOURCES
HELP_MPS_MAP_RESOURCES: Defines the quantity of MAP RESOURCES
HELP_MPS_NO_FOG: Visualizes the area which your units are able to see
HELP_MPS_CANCEL: Return to the MULTIPLAYER SETUP SCREEN
HELP_MPS_MAPS_LIST: To choose a MAP, move the cursor over its name and click the mouse button
HELP_MPS_USE_MAP_SETTINGS: Click to change any characteristics of the MAP
HELP_SG_SAVE_GAME: Type the NAME of the game
HELP_CH_SELECT_PLAYER: Select a player to send a message to
HELP_D_ACCEPT: Save and return to the game
HELP_T_AMOUNT: Select the resource type and the desired amount
HELP_CM1_VICTORY_CONDITION: Establish the EXACT CONDITION to win a game
HELP_CM1_STARTING_RESOURCES: Select the level of starting RESOURCES
HELP_CM1_NO_FOG: Visualizes the area which your units are able to see
HELP_CM1_USE_MAP_SETTINGS: Click to change any characteristics of the MAP
HELP_CM1_BACK: Return to the CUSTOM MAP SCREEN
HELP_O_BUILDING_SOUND: Enables or disables the sound of buildings
HELP_MPS_TOWERS_POP: Includes towers in the population limit count
VM_TIME_LIMIT_HIT: Time limit hit in %d minutes. The winner so far is %s.
VM_SCORE_LIMIT_HIT: Score limit hit in %d points. The winner so far is %s.
ERR_FIRST: Tzar is running for the first time on this system. Please update configuration settings first!
ERR_BADKINGDOMSCRIPT: Bad AI script for player %d, or script differs from server's!

MSG_AIECO3: %s has turned economic AI assistance on
MSG_AIWAR3: %s has turned war AI assistance on
MSG_GOLDREQ: This Magic Book requires at least %d amount of gold

ERR3_RANKSLOST: Connection with the game server was lost! The rankings will not be updated!
MP_SETUPMAP_TOWERS_POP: Include towers in the population limit
WEBAUDIO: Your browser is not compatible with Web Audio
